FuncDef: This command designates a local router DHCPv4 server for local pools management where IPv4 addresses for PPPoXv4 clients is allocated without the need for the internal router DHCP relay-agent. Those addresses are tied to PPPoX sessions and they are de-allocated when the PPPoX session is terminated.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the local 7450 ESS or 7750 SR DHCP server.
